forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain during the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 58F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Thunder possible. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Thunder possible. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low near 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low near 10C. NNW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 63F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
